scenes.action_text: CRAZY, STUPID, LOVE Written by Dan Fogelman February 19, 2010 FADE IN: 1 INT. FRENCH RESTAURANT (PASADENA, CA) - EVENING 1 Soft music. A classy joint. Below the tables, WE PAN well-heeled feet nuzzling. Finally we SETTLE ON: A PAIR OF FEET WHITE SNEAKERS sitting opposite FANCY HIGH HEELS. These feet aren't nuzzling. There's distance here. PULL UP, REVEALING CAL WEAVER (42) and his wife, TRACY (41). A hands
